name: Saison: Epigraphe
description:
All forces on earth are governed by a sect of deities in a realm known as Eous. These deities are particularly capricious and are known to cause disasters on a whim.

As the world falls into chaos, the four horsemen of the apocalypse are mobilized to bring about the end of days. Why now? Who is pulling the strings? Only Flora and Fauna, the deities of plant and animal life respectively, can quell their destructive nature to give humans another chance at life! 

A lite sequel of the game Saison I made back in 2017. I haven't given myself enough time to fully polish the experience, but as updates are pushed my full vision will be realized. 

Powered by Unity | Art created in Gimp and Marmoset Hexels 2 

Enjoy!
